post_title: Larry Doyle with Bat Yellow Brown Printers Scrap for trade.
post_content:
This is my favorite card in the set but I already have one of these YB Scraps so I figured I'd put this one out there to see if it shakes anything I'd like more loose.

I was looking mainly for the blank back Doyle with bat but that seems to have disappeared. Does anyone know where it's at, willing to add cash with the scrap.

Assuming the blank back does not show itself I would be open to other NY Natl print anomalies and error cards/scraps 

Shoot me an email [url]maxjcards@gmail.com[/url] and let's talk 

[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/MtG6NKF.jpeg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/69xAVax.jpeg[/IMG]

Full size images here

What other Giants freaks are out there?
